name: $\sqcup_{i = 1}^{\infty} \Spec \QQ$
description: The infinite disjoint union of copies of $\Spec \QQ$.

proofs.quasi-compact: The open cover $\{ \Spec(\QQ) \}_{i \ge 1}$ does not admit a finite subcover.
proofs.connected: Any disjoint union of (non-empty) schemes is not connected.
proofs.locally-noetherian: Every copy of $\Spec(\QQ)$ is locally noetherian.
proofs.finite-dimensional: The only irreducible closed subsets are single points.
